meanings.definition: A linear representation of important events in chronological order.
meanings.sent1: I created timelines to show the order of events in history class.
meanings.sent2: She used timelines to organize her study schedule for the week.
meanings.sent3: The timelines for the school play were so detailed, they looked like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The timelines of his life intersected at key moments, shaping his future.
meanings.sent5: The timelines in the museum made the historical events come alive.

meanings.definition: A schedule or plan of events.
meanings.sent1: The timelines for the project helped us stay on track with our tasks.
meanings.sent2: Her timelines for the party included a list of activities and timings.
meanings.sent3: The timelines for the picnic were so precise, it felt like a military operation.
meanings.sent4: His timelines for success were clear, with each step leading to the next.
meanings.sent5: Following the timelines for the event ensured everything ran smoothly.

meanings.definition: A graphical representation of a period of time.
meanings.sent1: The timelines on the chart showed the growth of the company over the years.
meanings.sent2: The timelines in the textbook illustrated the different eras in history.
meanings.sent3: The timelines on the graph made the data easier to understand at a glance.
meanings.sent4: Her timelines on the map traced the journey of the explorers across the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The timelines on the screen displayed the evolution of technology.
